item.description:
Please join me at the Cambridge River Festival. According to the website, there will be free live Jazz, Folk, Latin and World music bands.

The festival is between Harvard and Central Squares on Memorial Drive. Take the T to Harvard Square and walk about 5 to 10 minutes to Memorial Drive. It's between JFK Street and Western Avenue.

You may want to bring a beach towel or blanket to relax on while listening to music and a little bit of cash for food.

The festival is from 12 noon to 6pm, rain or shine; however, I may not stay the entire time and I definitely won't go if it's raining. The weather forecast, so far, looks beautiful!

Check out the following website for more info:

http://www.cambridgem...

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll email my cell phone # to the people who reply either yes or maybe on Friday the 13th, so reply either yes or maybe before Friday the 13th to get my cell phone #.
item.why: To hang out at the festival.
item.name: Cambridge River Festival
